entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clear. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 38 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
